summary: SummaryYour infallible look isn't complete without L'Oreal's Infallible Grip Gel Mechanical Liner. With a smudge-resistant, waterproof formula, this gel eyeliner delivers even strokes with 36HR hold.
details: DetailsBenefitsDefines & lines your eyes with hyper-pigmented, saturated color that lastsGel formula glides on smoothly for easy application with no mess & no touch-upsUp to 36HR wearApply as an even stroke or use the included blending tip to fade out lines for a dramatic lookWaterproof & smudge-resistantOphthalmologist tested & suitable for sensitive eyesItem 2603556How To UseApply along upper and lower lash lines from inner to outer corner to frame and define your eyes.If your eye is scratched, stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle.IngredientsDimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Polyethylene, Acrylates/Stearyl Acrylate/Dimethicone Methacrylate Copolymer, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Ozokerite, Cellulose, Polyisobutene, Alumina, Kaolin, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tin Oxide, Propylene Carbonate, Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Maltodextrin. May Contain (+/-): Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77007/Ultramarines, Ci 77742/Manganese Violet, Ci 77510/Ferric Ammonium Ferrocyanide, Ci 77266/Black 2, Ci 75470/Carmine, Ci 77510/Ferric Ferrocyanide, Ci 19140/Yellow 5 Lake, Ci 42090/Blue 1 Lake. Fil T285921/1
how_to_use: Apply along upper and lower lash lines from inner to outer corner to frame and define your eyes.If your eye is scratched, stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle.

reviews.headline: It's good
reviews.comments: Its a good eyeliner, but not good for waterline, is smudges alot and comes off after 10-20 minutes, ive tried using eyeshadow to set it too and it just dosnt stay. Still generally good to use it for wings and such

reviews.headline: The best
reviews.comments: This eyeliner glides on easily, and wears well.  Love the blue jersey and black.

reviews.headline: Not hypoallergenic :/
reviews.comments: I have sensitive eyes so unfortunately I cannot use this eyeliner. Immediate burning sensation and red eyes after application. If youre not sensitive then I am sure it is a great option as the color is highly pigmented and applies smoothly, but this one is not for me.

reviews.headline: Not smudge or waterproof as claimed
reviews.comments: Not smudge or waterproof as claimed

reviews.headline: Easy to apply
reviews.comments: Goods on smoothly. Nice, fine line.

reviews.headline: So smooth!
reviews.comments: This eyeliner goes on so smooth! It stays in place and lives up to the waterproof claim.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: This is a repeat buy. I like this product because it goes on gently and lasts all day. Sadly the shelves and display were sloppy and I tried buying two but got a wrong product placed in the same slot. I will return that misplaced one - which hurt my eyes - and try to buy another of this one.

reviews.headline: Like Anastasia Brow Wiz
reviews.comments: I love this because its like Anastasia Brow Wiz in the granite color but its not as expensive

reviews.headline: Lasted all Day at Disney
reviews.comments: I wore the brown denim shade to Disney for 2 days -magic kingdom and epcot. It was over 90 degrees weather both days in Florida and my eyeliner didn't smudge at all! Proved to be sweat proof and waterproof!

reviews.headline: Loreal. Eyeliner
reviews.comments: I will not purchase this eyeliner again.  It does not glide on and it smudges

reviews.headline: L oreal eyeliner
reviews.comments: I would not purchase this eyeliner again, it does not glide on and it smudges!

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I mistakenly purchased a similar product that didn't work half as well as this one.  Love the color saturation and long lasting of this product.

reviews.headline: It's just okay
reviews.comments: I have this in the brown denim shade and i like the color, pigment, and how it has a smudger & sharpener at the end. However, this eyeliner definitely smudges onto the lower lash line within a couple of hours of putting it on unless i set it with a powder, which i dont need to do with other liners that i like better.

reviews.headline: I would never buy this again
reviews.comments: I found this product very dry and drags over my eyelids. It takes me too long to get it dark enough and an even line.

reviews.headline: Girl YAAAAAS
reviews.comments: I give it 5 stars. Which is rare for me to do. I only wish it were easier to remove. Still working on finding a product for that. But MAN i love L'Oreal's infallible line. truly infallible!! stays on so long. piercingly beautiful and bold!

reviews.headline: Long lasting
reviews.comments: Smooth application, long lasting.

reviews.headline: d pencil to dry
reviews.comments: Each time wanted to use pencil was dry.

reviews.headline: Goes on smooth No tug
reviews.comments: Best eyeliners I have!! Great for "mature" skin as they glide on easily and don't get snagged on looser making.  Stays on all day.  Forget the higher priced exclusive brands.  This works great!

reviews.headline: was unusable after a few months
reviews.comments: I had to throw this eyeliner away after a few months because it completely hardened and was unusable. It also is not blendable and does not have good pigment.

reviews.headline: Nope
reviews.comments: Didn't last at all. Doesn't glide on as they say.

media.headline: GREAT PRODUCT!

faceoff_positive.comments: This was gifted for review purposes. I enjoy the Infallible grip gel liner and it has the consistency of a high end formula. It is smooth on the waterline. The smudger makes it easy to achieve that no effort look for a meeting because I WFH. The sharpener also came in hand when the tip broke off. I do not wear my makeup for 36 hrs however the liner does hold up through my work shift and what I need it to do.
faceoff_positive.headline: Impressed

faceoff_negative.comments: I liked the concept of liner that it is waterproof, smudge proof and blendable with a blending tool attached. However the actually formula lacks some of these claims. I did not find it to be smudge proof nor was it very blendable. The shade I received is 230 blue jersey and it is a beautiful sort of navy blue almost purple (not as bright as it looks on the photo on the package). It did not flake which was good. It was definitely pigmented which I liked as well. I don't believe it would last 36 hours but you really shouldn't be sleeping with eye liner so I don't plan to test that claim. Overall if you need an eyeliner in a pinch I'd pick this up but I prefer more higher end brands eye liners to this one.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice color, prefer others
